Name: Saju Jirugi
Steps:
1. Right leg steps forward into a Right Front Stance: Right Middle Punch, Kihap!
  2. Right leg shifts into a Left Front Stance facing C: Left Down Block
  3. Right leg steps forward into a Right Front Stance: Right Middle Punch
  4. Right leg shifts into a Left Front Stance facing D: Left Down Block
  5. Right leg steps forward into a Right Front Stance: Right Middle Punch
  6. Right leg shifts into a Left Front Stance facing E: Left Down Block
  7. Right leg steps forward into a Right Front Stance: Right Middle Punch, Kihap!
  8. Right leg returns to Parallel Ready Stance facing B.
  9. Left leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Middle Punch, Kihap!
  10. Left leg shifts into a Right Front Stance facing E: Right Down Block
  11. Left leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Middle Punch
  12. Left leg shifts into a Right Front Stance facing D: Right Down Block
  13. Left leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Middle Punch
  14. Left shifts into a Right Front Stance facing C: Right Down Block
  15. Left leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Middle Punch, Kihap!

Name: Saju Makgi
Steps:
1. Right leg steps back into a Left Front Stance: Left Open-Hand Down Block, Kihap!

  3. Right leg shifts into Left Front Stance facing D: Left Open-Hand Down Block

  6. Right leg steps forward into a Right Front Stance: Right Inside Forearm Block
  7. Right leg shifts into a Left Front Stance towards E: Left Open-Hand Down Block
  8. Right leg steps forward into a Right Front Stance: Right Inside Forearm Block, Kihap!
  9. Right leg returns to Parallel Ready Stance Facing C
  10. Left leg steps back into a Right Front Stance: Right Open-Hand Down Block, Kihap!
  11. Right leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Inside Forearm Block
  12. Left leg shifts into a Right Front Stance Towards E: Right Open-Hand Down Block
  13. Right leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Inside Forearm Block
  14. Left leg shifts into a Right Front Stance towards B: Right Open-Hand Down Block
  15. Right leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Inside Forearm Block
  16. Left leg shifts into a Right Front Stance towards D: Right Open-Hand Down Block
  17. Right leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Inside Forearm Block, Kihap!

  8. Left leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Middle Punch, kihap!
  9. Left leg turns into Left Back Stance facing C: Left Inside Forearm Block
  10. Right leg steps forward into Right Front Stance: Right Middle Punch
  11. Right leg turns into a Right Back Stance facing B: Right Inside Forearm Block
  12. Left leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Middle Punch
  13. Left leg turns into a Left Back Stance facing E: Left Inside Forearm Block
  14. Right leg steps forward into a Right Front Stance: Right Middle Punch
  15. Right leg turns into a Right Back Stance facing D: Right Inside Forearm Block
  16. Left leg steps forward into a Left Front Stance: Left Middle Punch
  17. Right leg steps forward into a Right Front Stance: Right Middle Punch
  18. Right leg steps back into a Left Front Stance: Left Middle Punch
  19. Left leg steps back into a Right Front Stance: Right Middle Punch, kihap!
